parts.name: K24/K20 'Frankenstein' Engine Build
parts.description: Combining the high-flow cylinder head from a K20A2/Z1/Z3 (Civic Si, RSX-S) with the larger displacement block from a K24A2/A4/A8 (TSX, Accord, CR-V, Element). Best of both worlds: Torque + High RPM flow.
specs: Head: K20A2, K20Z1, K20Z3 (True VTEC on intake & exhaust)
Block: K24A2 (TSX - Best pistons/rods), K24A4 (Accord/Element - cheaper)
Requires: K24 head gasket, CR-V passenger mount bracket (for EK/EG swaps)

parts.name: RBC Intake Manifold Swap
parts.description: The RBC intake manifold from the 2006-2011 Civic Si (K20Z3) is the best factory intake for K-Series engines. It flows significantly better than the PRB (RSX) or RBB (TSX) manifolds.
specs: Requires cutting the water neck flange (or buying a pre-cut one) to fit RSX/EP3 heads
Requires adapter for throttle body (if using cable throttle)

parts.name: Acura TL Type-S Brembo Swap
parts.description: The 4-piston Brembo calipers from the Acura TL Type-S (2007-2008) are a popular upgrade for other Honda/Acura models. They bolt directly to the knuckles of the 2004-2008 TSX and 2003-2007 Accord V6 (6MT).
specs: Requires TL-S Knuckles for some applications, or S2000 rotors with modification

parts.name: K20A2 Oil Pump Swap on K24
parts.description: The K24A2 (TSX) oil pump has balance shafts that rob power and cause cavitation at high RPM (over 7500). Swapping to the K20A2 (RSX-S) oil pump removes the balance shafts, freeing up horsepower and allowing safe revs to 8500+.
specs: Requires K20A2 Oil Pump, Chain, Guide, and Baffle
Requires modifying K24 block (tapping an oil passage)

parts.name: Civic Si (EP3) / RSX Seat Swap
parts.description: Front seats from the EP3 Civic Si and DC5 RSX are interchangeable with the EM2 Civic (2001-2005) and fit older Civics (EG/EK) with rail modifications.
specs: EP3 Seats: Heavily bolstered 'Recaro style' (USDM are not Recaro)
RSX Seats: Leather buckets with integrated headrests

parts.name: J37 Intake Manifold / Throttle Body Swap
parts.description: The intake manifold and throttle body from the J37 engine (Acura MDX/TL SH-AWD) flow significantly more than the J30/J32/J35 components. A popular upgrade for Accord V6 and TL owners.
specs: Requires adapter plate for some manifolds
Magnesium manifold is lighter and flows better

parts.name: Honda Element / CR-V Rear Diff Interchange
parts.description: The rear differentials are largely interchangeable between Element and 2nd Gen CR-V. The Element rear diff is often cheaper and easier to find.
specs: Fluid: Honda Dual Pump Fluid II ONLY

parts.name: Honda Fit (GE8) Intake Manifold on CR-Z
parts.description: The intake manifold from the 2nd Gen Honda Fit (GE8) flows better than the stock CR-Z (LEA) manifold. It is a direct bolt-on upgrade for the CR-Z hybrid.

parts.name: Acura RL (KB1) 4-Piston Caliper Swap
parts.description: The 4-piston Advics calipers from the 2005-2012 Acura RL are massive and cheap. They can be retrofitted to many Hondas (Civic, Accord, TSX) using a specific bracket (Fastbrakes or custom).

parts.name: S2000 AP2 Valve Retainers in AP1
parts.description: The intake valve retainers on the AP1 (2.0L) S2000 are prone to cracking if the engine is over-revved. Swapping to the stronger AP2 (2.2L) retainers and keepers is a critical reliability upgrade.
specs: Exhaust side usually fine with AP1 retainers
